Today in Pembrokeshire, St Brides Bay and Tenby are offering clean 1ft @12s WSW swell with light 5 mph ENE winds, making for fun little waves. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 2ft @6s WNW swell and fresh 17 mph NW winds, resulting in blown out surf. The day after continues the trend, with similar 2ft @5s WNW swell and 18 mph WNW winds keeping it poor. Best: today.
